plot: Focusing on the journey a young writer takes in his mind, how he may overcome his insomnia through strange hallucinations, with great friends and daring inspiration.
title: Dead Man's Dream
plot_es: Focusing on the journey a young writer takes in his mind, how he may overcome his insomnia through strange hallucinations, with great friends and daring inspiration.
